desc.en:
Seoul Metro (Korean: 서울매트로), also known as the Seoul Metropolitan Area Electric Railway, is an urban rail transit system serving Seoul, Incheon, Gyeonggi-do, Chungcheongnam-do, and Gangwon-do in South Korea. It is also one of the members of the Community of Metros (CoMET).
 The first line was officially opened for operation on August 15, 1974. According to the official website of Seoul Metro in July 2025, there are a total of 24 subway lines in Seoul, including those of Incheon Metro.
